filters.name: groups
filters.label: Grupos
filters.query: select value from tags where tags.resource_type = 'task'

filters.name: hosts
filters.label: Hosts
filters.query: SELECT hosts.name as value FROM hosts LEFT JOIN public.tag_resources ON hosts.uuid = tag_resources.resource_uuid LEFT JOIN public.tags ON tag_resources.tag = tags.id WHERE tags.resource_type = 'host' AND tags.value in ($groups)

components.name: totals
components.title: Ativos Monitorados
components.query: select count(*) as value from hosts h left join tag_resources tr on tr.resource_uuid = h.uuid and tr.resource_type = 'host' left join tags t on t.id = tr.tag where h.name in ($hosts) and t.value in ($groups)

components.name: totals
components.title: Ativos Monitorados
components.query: select count(*) as value from hosts h left join tag_resources tr on tr.resource_uuid = h.uuid and tr.resource_type = 'host' left join tags t on t.id = tr.tag where h.name in ($hosts) and t.value in ($groups)
